# 1. 정규분포 pdf값을 계산하는 자신만의 파이썬 함수를 정의하고,정규분포 mu=3, sigma=2의 pdf를 그릴 것

::: {#eae2014d .cell execution_count=1}
``` {.python .cell-code}
# X ~ N(3,2)

def npdf(x, mu,sigma):
    x=np.array(x)
    part1 = 1 / (sigma * np.sqrt(2 * np.pi))
    part2 = np.exp((-1/2) * ((x-mu)/np.pi)**2)
    y = part1 * part2
    return y

import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
from scipy.stats import norm

x_values = np.linspace(3-3*2,3+3*2,100)
pdf_values = npdf(x_values,3,2)
plt.plot(x_values, pdf_values, color='red', linewidth=2)
plt.show()
plt.clf()
```

# 2. 파이썬 scipy 패키지 사용해서 다음과 같은 확률을 구하시오
# X ~ N(2,3^2)
# 1) P(x<3)

::: {#d774fa74 .cell execution_count=2}
``` {.python .cell-code}
norm.cdf(3,loc=2, scale=3)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=22}
```
np.float64(0.6305586598182363)
```
:::
:::


# 2) P(2<x<5)

::: {#4d750e97 .cell execution_count=3}
``` {.python .cell-code}
norm.cdf(5,loc=2,scale=3) - norm.cdf(2,2,3)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=23}
```
np.float64(0.3413447460685429)
```
:::
:::


# 3) P(x<3 or x>7)

::: {#cea9465f .cell execution_count=4}
``` {.python .cell-code}
norm.cdf(3,2,3) + 1 - norm.cdf(7,2,3)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=24}
```
np.float64(0.6783490120910509)
```
:::
:::


# 3. LS 빅데이터 스쿨 학생들의 중간고사 점수는 평균 30이고, 분산이 4인 정규분포를 따른다. 상위 5%에 해당하는 학생의 점수는?

::: {#06cb0be5 .cell execution_count=5}
``` {.python .cell-code}
# X ~ N(30, 4=2^2) 
# P(x >= 0.95)
norm.ppf(0.95, 30, 2)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=25}
```
np.float64(33.28970725390295)
```
:::
:::
